mapper.insert: insert into noticeboard (num,writer, title, content, regdate) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from noticeboard),#{writer},#{title}, #{content}, #{regdate})
mapper.select: select num,writer,title,content,regdate from noticeboard order by num desc
mapper.update: update noticeboard set title= #{title}, content= #{content} where num=#{num}
